result.title: Suggestions
result.content:
Hello, I'm nico_shindannin. I have two suggestions.

(1) I am often confused when the next contest will be held since the contest time is written for only one time zone. It would be convenient if there is a link to this world clock website,
http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/

(2) I would like to know contest rules, but I can't find them. For example, what is the border between Div. 1 and Div. 2? If there is a web-page to explain about the basic rules, it will be useful.

Thanks!
